venue.address_2: Suite 188 - at the end of the pier
venue.name: Fenway Bark

item.description:
Hi everyone, get ready for a SUNDAY meetup at FENWAY BARK!

Come play from 11am - 1pm and get 20% off all services and products during that time. Then stay a little longer for the French Bulldog Village rescue event that starts at 1pm. During their event, 10% of all purchases at Fenway Bark will go to the French Bulldog Village.

Parking is free and there's plenty of it.

From Fenway Bark: For the safety of all our guests, we require that all dogs who use our indoor lawns to have all our health requirements met - all dogs attending should have documentation showing up to date vaccinations and a negative fecal float in the past 6 months to use our indoor lawns. Veterinary records can be faxed to Fenway Bark at 617-507-8271 in advance of the meetup. Intact dogs need to be kept on a non retractable leash for the safety of all guests.

Meetup dues are $3 per frenchie...this covers the $12 monthly fee to host our meetup.com group online. Anything received in excess of the $12 will be donated to the French Bulldog Village in the group's name. :)

Thanks so much, we can't wait to see you! Letitia & Clyde

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: June French Bulldog Meetup
